content:
Check:
  any:
    - all:
        - name: RDOMAIN
          operator: non_empty
        - name: RDOMAIN
          operator: not_equal_to
          value: DM
          value_is_literal: true
        - name: IDVAR
          operator: empty
Core:
  Id: CORE-000158
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: IDVAR must be specified.
Outcome:
  Message: IDVAR should not be missing when RDOMAIN is not in (empty, DM).
  Output Variables:
    - RDOMAIN
    - IDVAR
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0163
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: Identifying variable in the parent dataset that identifies
                  the record(s) to which the comment applies.  Examples AESEQ or CMGRPID.
                  Used only when individual comments are related to domain records.  Null
                  for comments collected on separate CRFs.
                Document: IG v3.4
                Item: Specification
                Section: '5.1'
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - SPECIAL-PURPOSE
  Domains:
    Include:
      - CO

Outcome.Message: IDVAR should not be missing when RDOMAIN is not in (empty, DM).

Citations.Cited_Guidance: Identifying variable in the parent dataset that identifies the record(s) to which the comment applies.  Examples AESEQ or CMGRPID. Used only when individual comments are related to domain records.  Null for comments collected on separate CRFs.
